title: [Mr. Corbett's holiday]
creator_credit: David Lee, Protector International, Qantas Airways and Crawford Productions
brief_description: Mr Henry J. Corbett arrives on a trip to Australia. Through his trip we are shown all the marvelous range of safety industrial gear made by Protector International. This films is basically a marketing tool for Protector and QANTAS.
